lead_paragraph: With Jim Sorgi out the team has a daunting hole to fill at quarterback behind Eli Manning, while Sinorice Moss is most likely seen his last days as a Giant.
snippet: With Jim Sorgi out the team has a daunting hole to fill at quarterback behind Eli Manning, while Sinorice Moss is most likely seen his last days as a Giant.

headline.main: Giants Lose Sorgi and Moss for Season
headline.seo: Giants Put Backup QB Sorgi, Receiver Moss on Injured Reserve
headline.print_headline: Giants Lose Sorgi and Moss for Season
